hero.title: ASSESE: Your entry point to Milan for growing in Italy and expanding into Europe.
hero.subtitle: We are an agile and transversal accelerator: we support Italian and international companies with concrete business entry, internationalization, and domiciliation services, with access to a strategic operational space in Porta Genova.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: An agile accelerator, not a coworking space.
about.paragraph: ASSESE - Association for European Economic and Social Development – was born to help companies, startups, and professionals transform an idea into a real market presence: in Italy and in the European context. We operate transversally (design, fashion, trade, services, technology) and work with a practical approach: connections, events, skills, physical space, and operational support.

services.title: What We Do (Services)
services.box3_title: ASSESE HUB – Operational Space in Porta Genova
services.box3_li4: Suitable for temporary showrooms, workshops, shootings, presentations, business events

membership.title: Business Landing Program (Membership)
membership.subtitle: It's not just an address: it's an operational package to enter Milan and activate your presence.
membership.plan2_li4: Company profile in the ASSESE network (listing)
membership.plan3_li4: Targeted introductions into the local network (upon availability)

hub.title: Our Operational Space
hub.subtitle: Short-term rental ASSESE HUB (Porta Genova – Milan)
hub.description: Flexible solutions for those who need a professional space with high visibility:
hub.ideal_for: Ideal for: showrooms, pop-ups, workshops, shootings, corporate events, B2B presentations.

why.title: Why ASSESE
why.li1: A single base in Milan to operate, meet, and present
why.li2: Domiciliation + physical space + networking, in the same ecosystem
why.li3: Agile approach: fast times, practical solutions, real contacts
why.li4: Suitable for international companies and Italian SMEs that want to grow
